column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////It's probably more like 3.5 stars
column2: but this is a really nice bakery with a variety of options.  The burrata and heirloom tomato sandwich was light and filling
column3: not exactly as flavorful as we were hoping but still really nice.  The side of parmesan fries were not what we were hoping for
column4: they had a dusty raw flour taste to them and not enough salt.  We got the chocolate chip and chocolate walnut cookies to try and they were kind of underwhelming.  I think the standout was the cherry and cheese danish.  It's not usually the type of bakery item I would go for
column5: but the dough was really nice and the filling was the right balance of sweet and tart.  You can tell this place really cares about what they're putting out.
